Package components

Class SnpEffAnnotator

java.lang.Object
components.SnpEffAnnotator
public final class SnpEffAnnotator
extends java.lang.Object
Runs a local installation of SnpEff via command line.

Used to run SnpEff .vcf file annotations.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.1
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • runSnpEff

      public static void runSnpEff​(java.io.File targetDir, java.io.File targetVcf, java.io.File referenceFasta, java.io.File referenceGff, java.lang.String referenceChromosome) throws java.io.IOException, MusialIOException
      Initializes all necessary configuration files and runs SnpEff on a single .vcf file.
      Parameters:
      targetDir - File instance pointing to the directory at which SnpEff shall be run.
      targetVcf - File instance pointing to the vcf file to annotate.
      referenceFasta - File instance pointing to the fasta file containing the reference genome.
      referenceGff - File instance pointing to the gff file containing the reference genome annotation.
      referenceChromosome - String storing the reference chromosome name.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown if any input or output file is missing or unable to being generated (caused by any native Java method).
      MusialIOException - Thrown if any input or output file is missing or unable to being generated (caused by any MUSIAL method).

    • convertAnnotation

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> convertAnnotation​(java.lang.String snpEffAnnotationString)
      Converts a SnpEff annotation string into a HashMap object.
      Parameters:
      snpEffAnnotationString - String containing the content of a SnpEff annotation.
      Returns:
      HashMap containing a key/value pair for each SnpEff annotation of the passed String.
